row.entry: Top left pile. All cards are placed here at beginning of play.
Nine piles in a 3x3 formation. Each Tableau pile is dealt one card face up.

sect2.title: Rules
sect2.para: Remove cards in pairs that add up to ten. Jacks, Queens and Kings are removed in pairs. Tens cannot be removed. All empty slots are automatically filled by the Stock.

sect2.title: Scoring
sect2.para: Removing each pair of cards scores two points.

sect2.title: Strategy
sect2.para: This is a pure luck game. Therefore, any strategy involved would have to do with increasing your luck.
